item.title: Ask a Flooder 12: Puppeteer vs Selenium: which one is better for load testing?
item.description: Originally posted here. When it comes to software testing, the debate of Puppeteer vs Selenium is a hot one. Nicole tackles it here to determine which one is better for load testing in particular. Spoiler: The answer is still “it depends”. Or catch the audio version here: Hi everyone, Nicole here again, back for another Ask a Flooder, and today, the question is: “Puppeteer vs. Selenium: which one is better for load testing?
